snippet: A fatal accident in Boston has exposed the liability car owners can face when they offer to rent their cars through companies like RelayRides.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column describes incident in which a person renting a car through RelayRides died after crashing into another car; notes that crash, which injured four other adults, has generated insurance claims far over the $1 million covered by RelayRides; contends that accident represents the biggest threat so far to the nascent peer-to-peer car rental industry.
lead_paragraph: A fatal accident in Boston has exposed the liability car owners can face when they offer to rent their cars through companies like RelayRides.

headline.print_headline: Fatal Collision Makes Car-Sharing Worries No Longer Theoretical
headline.seo: RelayRides Accident Raises Questions on Liabilities of Car Sharing
headline.main: Fatal Collision Makes Car-Sharing Worries No Longer Theoretical
